function.name: alarm_setMode
function.description: This function is used to set the alarm mode of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the alarm mode.

predefinedAlarmMode.description: The predefined alarm mode to set (e.g., siren).
